tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE word_documents (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE word_count (
  word_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  word VARCHAR(255),
  count INT,
  document_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES word_documents(document_id)
)

CREATE TABLE document_summary (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  summary_text TEXT,
  summary_length INT
)

CREATE TABLE word_statistics (
  word_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  word_count INT,
  word_frequency FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE word_document (
    word_id INT,
    document_id INT,
    frequency INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (word_id, document_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (word_id) REFERENCES word_frequency(word_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES document(document_id)
);

CREATE TABLE summary_word (
    summary_id INT,
    word_id INT,
    frequency INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (summary_id, word_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (summary_id) REFERENCES summary(summary_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (word_id) REFERENCES word_frequency(word_id)
);
